name: Japnit K. Ahuja
desc: Japnit oversees all operations and is the head of the Singapore chapter of The Girl Code. She’s a student at the National Junior College, Singapore.

name: Samriddhi Agnihotri
desc: Samriddhi oversees all operations and is the head of the Indian chapter of The Girl Code.

name: Naman Sood
desc: Naman is in charge of the front-end and back-end components of the website. He is a student of University of Waterloo, Canada.

name: Tishya Doraiswamy
desc: Tishya creates written content for the organisation, including articles for publications, curating information for our website, and working on the medium blog. She is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.

name: Vanaj Moorthy
desc: Vanaj looks after the design components of the website including,illustrations and animations. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.

name: Srijon Sinha
desc: Srijon looks after animations, illustrations, videos, and editing. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.

name: Sidhant Bhavnani
desc: Sidhant looks after the design, development and implementation of the curriculum.

name: Priyanshi Ahuja
desc: Priyanshi looks after the content for the organisation including publications, social media outreach and The Girl Code Medium. She’s a student at Delhi Public School RK Puram.

name: Angad Singh
desc: Angad is in charge of the front-end and back-end components of the website. He is a student of The Delhi Public School R.K. Puram, India.

name: Naman Shankhydhar
desc: Naman is in charge of the front-end components of the website. He is a student of JSS Academy of Technical Education Noida, India.

name: Saranyaa Kashyap
desc: Saranyaa is a graphic designer and designs social media posts for The Girl Code. She is a student of Delhi Public School R.K. Puram.

name: Dhimant Ananmay
desc: Dhimant works the curriculum and handles social media. He is a student of The Shri Ram School, India.
